title: What are the examples of permutation and combination? - Quora

response.answer_text: Examples of permutations and combinations Picking a team of 3 from a group of 10 - combinations. But Picking a president, vice president and secretary from a group of 10 - permutations.Picking 3 items from a menu of 10 - combinations. But ranking 3 best items as first, second and third from 10 items - permutations.
